document.full_text: jim tressel, who guided ohio state to its first national title in 34 years, resigned monday amid ncaa violations and mounting revelations that sullied the image of one of the country's top football programs.
document.title: jim tressel resigns from ohio state
lines_and_colors: jim tressel, who guided ohio state to its first national title in 34 years, resigned monday amid ncaa violations and mounting revelations that sullied the image of one of the country's top football programs.
